column5: Im looking for a place to go fishing with a kayak in Hamilton Stoney Creek or Burlington area. I have been to a couple conservation areas a found that most of the places had samll or almost no fish. If some one could suggest to me a good place to go where there is good fishing that would be great.
The Attawapiskat has some good fishing, a little outside the area though
Where about's is that I have never heard of it.
Lots of big smallmouth in Lake Ontario.
What do you use to catch them?
